directions: Spread the peanut butter onto one slice of bread. Spread the marshmallow creme onto the other slice. Place the bread topping-side-up onto a microwave-safe plate. Cook in the microwave on High for 30 seconds. Place the two halves together and serve.
ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons marshmallow cream (such as Marshmallow Fluff®)
title: PBM Sandwich
